悾悾悾

悾字的基本解释

悾
kōng
诚恳：“苟明公有以察其悾款，言岂在多。”
空虚。

悾
kǒng
〔悾愡〕倏不得志。

悾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kōng］
［《廣韻》苦紅切，平東，溪。］
［《廣韻》苦江切，平江，溪。］
［《廣韻》苦貢切，去送，溪。］
(1)诚恳。参见“悾悾”、“悾款”。
(2)空虚。

悾字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悾； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页389第21
【廣韻】【正韻】苦紅切【集韻】【韻會】枯公切，?音空。誠也，慤也。【任昉·勸進箋】實有愚誠，不任悾款。　又悾悾，無知貌。【論語】悾悾而不信。　又【集韻】枯江切，音腔。【朱子·游臥龍詩】訪我深㵎㡳，晤言絕紛哤城南且細說，慰我心悾悾。又【集韻】苦動切，音孔。悾惚，倏不得志也。　又【集韻】苦貢切，音控。義同。

悾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
悾字的起名意思

暂无。

Sincerely: "Gou Ming has the public to observe his arrears, but there are too many to say."
emptiness.

〔悾愡〕Unwilling.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kōng］
["Guangyun" bitter red cut, Pingdong, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" bitter river cut, Pingjiang, stream. ]
["Guangyun" bitter tribute cut, go to send, Xi. ]
(1) Sincere. See also "extraordinary", "extraordinary money".
(2) Emptiness.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悾; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 389 21
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Bitter Red Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Withered public cut, sound empty. Sincerely, 慤 also. [Ren Fang·Advise to enter the paper] It is really foolish and sincere, and I don’t want to be arrogant.　Against embarrassment, ignorant appearance. [The Analects of Confucius] Unbelief.　[Jiyun] Kujiang cut, tune. 【Zhuzi·You Wolong Poem】Visit me Shen 㵎㡳, and I will talk in detail in the south of the city, so as to comfort my anxiety. [Jiyun] bitterly cut, sound hole. Terrible, unwilling.　[Jiyun] bitter tribute cutting, sound control. The same meaning.
